summary: An FBI Threat Intake Examiner forwards a public tip submitted on April 12, 2021, regarding possible information on Ghislaine Maxwell and a human trafficking investigation. The tipster claims to have spoken with Maxwell's associates and wishes to discuss both this case and a previous personal case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The tip submitted to the FBI provides information concerning an investigation surrounding her, related to human trafficking.

events.title: Tip submission regarding Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: An individual submits an online tip to the FBI National Threat Operations Center regarding possible information on Ghislaine Maxwell and a human trafficking investigation.

keyFacts: A tip was submitted to the FBI on April 12, 2021, concerning Ghislaine Maxwell and a human trafficking investigation.
The tipster claims to have talked with several of Ghislaine Maxwell's associates.
The tipster also wishes to discuss a previous personal case that occurred some time ago.
The FBI's database queries (Guardian and Sentinel) were run on the tip information, with one query for the tipster's name revealing 476 results in Sentinel.
The document is an internal FBI email forwarding a public tip for situational awareness and potential action by the NY Division.
